articles.content: For the app to work well, we might need an 80% take-up. Unless it is made mandatory, we'll need both private and social incentives.With Australias test-confirmed daily COVID-19 infection rates continuing to fall to relatively low levels, there is considerable… [+4258 chars]

articles.author: Jake Smith
articles.title: “COVID Toes” May Be a New, Rare Symptom of Coronavirus, According to Doctors - Prevention.com
articles.description: In some patients, these lesions could be the first—or only—sign of COVID-19.
articles.content:
• Another unusual symptom of the novel coronavirus has surfaced: discolored toes that look swollen and feel painful to the touch.
  • Dubbed “COVID toes,” the rare symptom presents mostly in younger patients.

articles.title: Blood Clots a New Surprise Side Effect in Coronavirus Patients | NBC10 Philadelphia - NBC10 Philadelphia
articles.description: Doctors are noticing a new trend in COVID-19 patients in the form of blood clots. NBC10’s Matt DeLucia spoke with two local doctors about what they’re seeing...
